co.paralleluniverse.strands.channels

Interface Channel<Message>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Port<Message>, ReceivePort<Message>, SendPort<Message>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StandardChannel<Message>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mailbox, QueueChannel, QueueDoubleChannel, QueueFloatChannel, QueueIntChannel, QueueLongChannel, QueueObjectChannel, QueuePrimitiveChannel, SingleConsumerQueueChannel, TimeoutChannel, TransferChannel

    public interface Channel<Message>
extends SendPort<Message>, ReceivePort<Message>
    A message-passing channel. Implementations of this interface are encouraged (though not required) to implement StandardChannel
